summary: Exotic Arrow Collection will be a collection of various special arrows.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6][center][color=#45818e]Exotic Arrow Collection[/color][/center][/size][/b]
[line]
[color=#cfe2f3][size=3][b]Exotic Arrow Collection is a small collection of personal arrow mods, that all have unique effects. I know there are several similar mods out there, but this is mostly for personal use, plus i've had a half [/b][b]finished[/b][b] version of this sitting on my [/b][b]hard drive[/b][b] since late 2016. There's only one arrow now but ill be adding more later as i come up with them and find the time. I currently have 2 as concepts.[/b][/size]

[/color][line][color=#cfe2f3][font=Impact][size=5]FEATURES[/size][/font]
[/color][list]
[*][color=#cfe2f3]Aetherious Arrows: Arrows made of glass and fragments of soul gems that shatter upon impact applying the soul trap effect.[/color]
[*][color=#cfe2f3]More Arrows will be added later.[/color]
[/list][color=#cfe2f3][size=2]
[center]See ChangeLog for Details[/center][/size]
[/color][line][color=#cfe2f3][center][font=Impact][size=5]COMPATIBILITY
[/size][/font][size=2]This mod doesn't overwrite anything so there should be any compatibility problems.[/size][/center]
[/color][line][color=#cfe2f3]
[font=Impact][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/font]
Manual: Unzip the file and drop the contents into your Skyrim Data folder.

You can also a mod manager such as Mod Organizer, NMM, or Wrye Bash.[/color]
author: MPankey
